title: Modi govt turned around banking sector, over Rs 10 lakh crore bad loans recovered in 10 years: Nirmala Sitharaman
description: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman highlighted the Modi government's success in the banking sector, recovering over Rs 10 lakh crore from bad loans. The Enforcement Directorate investigated 1,105 bank fraud cases, attaching proceeds worth Rs 64,920 crore.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
